comments.author: just an English teacher ;)
comments.content: What ended up happening?  Did you find a job? Did you stay in Japan?  Were you deported???  How was the cycling trip?  I'm going through a similar situation and found your site... could you tell me what ended up happening?  宜しくお願いします！

comments.author: randy
comments.content: I ended up flying back home before my 3-month period expired. I've been in Europe ever since, although longing to go back to Japan. If you're in Japan right now and are enjoying it, then stay! It's a pain to get back there once you're out.
